values:
Robin and Hoyaton have been disappearing on a totally regular basis!  But that is okay because Maddy and I have totally been teaching the kids the most outstanding art of windsurfing on the lake!  They are a most enthusiastic group!  And one can breathe underwater which is excellent!!!! :D  Though it was most troubling when we thought he had like, died at the bottom of the lake.  Cha.  But he was totally still breathing and looking for this little dudette's bracelet.

Uhh..anyways!  It is time for me to depart and partake in the preparation of peanut butter and jelly sandwiches!  Catch ya later, dudes!!

Woah!  First of all, I am most apologetic, Mrs. Ebonmaw!  For although I totally saved your life, I also percolated chameleon saliva upon your personage!  All over that totally bodacious top you were wearing!  Sorry.  I'll totally pay for the dry cleaning bill!

Second!  That was a most unusual hostage location!  Most villains take them to the top of skyscrapers or something!  But that was a totally reputable petting zoo, and I would like very much to re-visit at a time when lives are not in danger!  I totally wish I could have a pet duckling.  They are most adorable!!  But I already have what is now an excellently huge aquarium.  And I love my little sea dudes in a totally platonic buddy way!

Uhhh...oh yah!  Maddy!  You totally predicted that the tiny lamb would bring about my downfall!  And I TOTALLY slipped on it's crap and landed on my butt! :D  Cha.  That was downfall-bringing indeed.

Also DUDE!  Tony got HUGE, dude!  Like...duuuuude.  Excellent!  I totally hope he manages to change back though because like, bummer.

Also, it is somewhat sweet that Debbie and Mr. D enjoy each other!!  However that must be most awkward for Casey and Quentin!  Maybe.  Yah.

Uhhhhh...so excellent job once again, comrades! :D  Those villains need to like, learn to be good at fighting or something.  Only not because then we might lose.  Hahaha!

anyways, maybe i will see you all inj  person to congratulate you because this is gettsin most tedious!! catch ya later1

H'okay so last night, yah? My most resplendently beautiful girlfriend Maddy and myself went to a totally excellent seafood restaurant!  And I was like "Woah, I am most definitely in the mood for lobster!" and the waiter was all "Good choice, sir!" and I was like "Oh! Thank you, waiter dude!" and then he goes away and he comes back with a LIVING LOBSTER. And the lobster is all "Hey dude! I'm a totally alive lobster! Look at my cute claws all wiggling." and I was like "NO WAY! Well now we're practically buddies! D:" And buds do not eat buds, dude!! 

So Maddy and I SAVED the lobster dude and all HIS buddies and now they are free! :D It was a most triumphant day for lobsterkind! And for us, too. Cha. So then we went and ate something totally vegetarian. Except I think it had chicken in it. 

Anyways! I am not so fond of the city! I mean yah the buildings are fun to climb and stuff, but I totally miss the ocean! When we get back, I am going on a most enlivened surf-a-thon! :D

Woah dudes like...is anybody patrolling area A-52 on the map? Because I totally just scaled up a most humongous skyscraper, and in the distance I did witness something most peculiar occurring in that region! Near that totally huge bank! We should check it out.

H'okay! So, my most excellently beautiful girlfriend Maddy and myself are planning an excursion to the beach tomorrow! And we are totally leaving at 11am in the morning, so like, if anybody would like to join us then that is the time we will be departing! 

The beach we will travel to is most excellent for surfing! Plus they totally have ice cream, too! 

So uh...yah! It will be a most triumphant time! :D

GIVE ME BACK MY GIRLFRIEND YOU TOTALLY EVIL DICKWEEDS!!!!!!



I only just got her :(

First of all - I would like to offer my congratulations for a most outstanding victory! 

But second, a most, most heinous event has transpired D: My most excellent room-mate and distinguished colleage, Codii Biscuits, totally got wiped out T____T Don't fear the reaper, photo dude. 

So uh...yah, gonna go stop my head from bleeding. Catch ya later.

Woah! Greetings my fellow distinguished classmates and future buddy dudes and babes! :D 

This school is non-non-non-non-NON-heinous. And I'm TOTALLY psyched to be here since my old school was blown up by some bogus villain dudes! Cha! But this places seems most outstanding. Besides, in addition, my most excellent companion Casey is here!! And other babes and dudes from that totally bogus school! Like SLICK and SPEEDY! How's it goin' Abbott-donnians?  Long time no see! 

So uh...oh yah! Intro! I am Tobias Fletcher! Also known as TongueTwister! That is my most resplendent codename. What's yours? :D And does anybody know if there is a beach located anywhere near the premises? That would be totally stellar! 

H'okay, I am most parched! So I am going to journey to the cafeteria and purchase a delicious frosty slushie to quench my most odious thirst!! Catch ya later!
